title: Carrie and the Dastardly Dragons
description: Filthy, vicious, bitter, words whispered in dark corners to describe The Elite.And now, they're All. Mine.Best friends since they were kids, the Elite always had each other's back.As the strongest, most loyal group of dragon shifters in the Queenâ€™s Guard, they rule their world with a clenched fist.They work together seamlessly and ruthlessly enforce strict rules. No one screws with them.And they never let a woman get between them....Until me.****Carrie and the Broken Dragons is a dark, paranormal romance with a HEA at the end of Carrie and the Dangerous Dragons. This book features one woman and three sexy & demanding, asshole dragon shifters.****Buy now to dive into this paranormal romance world!
author: Ava Mason
